title: Lunar Reveal @Riot Taken down early
body: The lunar caitlyn skin says available through the 8th 23:59 pst  which is today but its no longer available in the store, which is upsetting because it is a very beautiful skin tthat i would like to purchase.Riot please fix and make availble again today until the time u said it wouldnt be for sale i hate when i get my paycheck and i cant spend it on the skin i want.

replies.body: The page you're linking is in reference to 2016.  The 2017 Lunar Revel details are available [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/lunar-revel-2017#/intro).  The event ended on February 2nd.  Sorry for the confusion.  :(  Lunar Revel Caitlyn is a legacy skin, so if it's not available now it can still come back in the future.  It can also be found through mystery gifts or hextech crafting.  I hope that helps!
